name: Contrast (itch) (Endlesszerosoul)
description:
Contrast is a puzzle-platformer where every time you jump the world changes.

blue objects and red objects cannot exist on the same plane at the same time, and jumping switches the color that is currently in existence.

Checkpoints add time to your run when used, introducing a risk vs. reward mechanic as death will set you back farther if you haven't activated many checkpoints.
